Parameters: One or more player IDs to invite to the match.
addInvitedPlayers(java.util.ArrayList<ja.Description: Add a list of player IDs to invite to the match.

setVariant(int).Description: Sets the variant for the match. This is an optional, developer-controlled parameter describing the type of game to play, and is used for auto-matching criteria. Must be either a positive integer, or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#turnbased#TurnBasedMatch#MATCH_VARIANT_DEFAULT_E@ (the default) if not desired. Note that variants must match exactly. Thus, if you do not specify a variant, only other matches created with @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#turnbased#TurnBasedMatch#MATCH_VARIANT_DEFAULT_E@ will be considered potential auto-matches.

Parameters: Player ID to invite to the match.
addInvitedPlayer(java.lang.String).Description: Add a player ID to invite to the match.

Parameters: The criteria for auto-matching one or more players for the match. If null, the match is created with the invited players only.
setAutoMatchCriteria(android.os.Bundle).Description: Sets the auto-match criteria for the match. See @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#turnbased#TurnBasedMatchConfig#createAutoMatchCriteria_E@.
